TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CallerMemberNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class CallerMemberNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class CallerMemberNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 可讓您取得方法呼叫端的方法或屬性名稱。

span.span: Allows you to obtain the method or property name of the caller to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您套用`CallerMemberName`屬性加入具有預設值的選擇性參數。You apply the `CallerMemberName` attribute to an optional parameter that has a default value. 您必須指定明確的預設值的選擇性參數。You must specify an explicit default value for the optional parameter. 您無法將此屬性套用至未指定為選擇性的參數。You can't apply this attribute to parameters that aren't specified as optional. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫端資訊](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9cb2b8c0-c4f6-44b8-9c90-38948455b373)。For more information, see [Caller Information](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9cb2b8c0-c4f6-44b8-9c90-38948455b373). 您可以使用 `CallerMemberName` 屬性避免指定成員名稱做為所呼叫方法的 `String` 引數。You can use the `CallerMemberName` attribute to avoid specifying the member name as a `String` argument to the called method. 利用這個技巧就可以避免發生 [重新命名重構] 未變更 `String` 值這個問題。By using this technique, you avoid the problem that **Rename Refactoring** doesn't change the `String` values. 這是特別適用於下列工作：This is especially useful for the following tasks: - 使用追蹤和診斷常式。Using tracing and diagnostic routines. - 當繫結資料時，實作 介面。Implementing the interface when binding data. 這個介面可讓物件的屬性告知繫結的控制項屬性已變更，所以控制項可以顯示更新的資訊。This interface allows the property of an object to notify a bound control that the property has changed, so that the control can display the updated information. 沒有 `CallerMemberName` 屬性 (Attribute)，您就必須指定屬性 (Property) 名稱做為常值。Without the `CallerMemberName` attribute, you must specify the property name as a literal. 下圖顯示當您使用 `CallerMemberName` 屬性時，傳回的成員名稱。The following chart shows the member names that are returned when you use the `CallerMemberName` attribute. |呼叫內發生Call occurs within|成員名稱結果Member name result| |-|-| |方法、屬性或事件Method, property, or event|產生呼叫的方法、屬性或事件的名稱。The name of the method, property, or event from which the call originated.| |建構函式Constructor|字串 ".ctor"The string ".ctor"| |靜態建構函式Static constructor|字串 ".cctor"The string ".cctor"| |解構函式Destructor|字串 "Finalize"The string "Finalize"| |使用者定義的運算子或轉換User-defined operators or conversions|產生的成員名稱，例如 "op_Addition"。The generated name for the member, for example, "op_Addition".| |屬性建構函式Attribute constructor|套用屬性的成員名稱。The name of the member to which the attribute is applied. 如果屬性為成員內的任何項目 (例如參數、傳回值或泛型類型參數)，這個結果會是與該項目相關聯的成員名稱。If the attribute is any element within a member (such as a parameter, a return value, or a generic type parameter), this result is the name of the member that's associated with that element.| |無包含的成員 (例如，組件層級或套用至類型的屬性)No containing member (for example, assembly-level or attributes applied to types)|選擇性參數的預設值。The default value of the optional parameter.| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 `CallerMemberName` 屬性。The following example shows how to use the `CallerMemberName` attribute. 每次呼叫`TraceMessage`方法時，呼叫端資訊會替代做為選擇性參數的引數。On each call to the `TraceMessage` method, the caller information is substituted as an argument to the optional parameter. [!code-csharp[csProgGuideAttributes#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/csProgGuideAttributes/CS/callerinfo.cs#51)] [!code-vb[csProgGuideAttributes#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/csProgGuideAttributes/vb/callerinfo.vb#51)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
